author: The Editorial Board
title: The Oxfam Sex Scandal
text:
A sex-abuse scandal at Oxfam, the British-based global charity, is roiling U.K. politics, and the repercussions may ripple around the world. Maybe the scandal will even trigger a long-overdue debate about the limits of foreign aid.
The details suggest an institution whose employees ran amok amid weak oversight. Oxfam staff in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake allegedly hosted parties with local prostitutes, as the Times of London reported Friday. Similar allegations have been made against at least one employee when he worked...
